H0.text: The sand will be repelled by the magnet when a magnet is placed in the center of a plastic bowl containing a mixture of iron filings and sand.

H1.text: The iron filings will be attracted to the magnet when a magnet is placed in the center of a plastic bowl containing a mixture of iron filings and sand.

H2.text: The sand will be attracted to the magnet when a magnet is placed in the center of a plastic bowl containing a mixture of iron filings and sand.

H3.text: The iron filings will be repelled by the magnet if a magnet is placed in the center of a plastic bowl containing a mixture of iron filings and sand.

A4.text: Magnets can pick up magnetic items (iron nails, staples, tacks, paper clips) that are either too small, too hard to reach, or too thin for fingers to hold.
